name: Berlin
description: Berlin straddles the banks of the Spree, which flows into the Havel (a tributary of the Elbe) in the western borough.

name: New Delhi
description: Delhi, is a city and a union territory of India containing New Delhi, the capital of India.[17][18] Located on the Yamuna river.

name: London
description: The City of London is a city, ceremonial county and local government district that contains the historic centre and the primary.

name: Cuba
description: Cuba City is a city partly in Grant County and partly in Lafayette County in the U.S. state of Wisconsin.

name: Rome
description: Rome is the capital city of Italy. It is also the capital of the Lazio region, the centre of the Metropolitan City of Rome.

name: Dubai
description: Dubai Dubayy Gulf Arabic is the most populous city in the United Arab Emirates (UAE) and the capital of the Emirate of Dubai.

name: South Island
description: The South Island, also officially named Te Waipounamu, is the larger of the two major islands of New Zealand in surface area.

name: Paris
description: The Eiffel Tower French: tour Eiffel (About this soundlisten)) is a wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars in Paris, France.

name: Bora Bora
description: Bora Bora is an island group in the Leeward Islands. The Leeward Islands comprise the western part of the Society Islands of French Polynesia.

name: Maui
description: The island of Maui is the second-largest of the Hawaiian Islands at 727.2 square miles and is the 17th largest island in the United States.

name: Tahiti
description: Tahiti is the largest island of the Windward group of the Society Islands in French Polynesia, located in the central part of the Pacific Ocean.

name: Tokyoi
